description: Acid Reflux or Heartburn causes burning, chest pain and cough as its most common symptoms. Surprisingly, Acid Reflux is often the result NOT of having sufficient acid in the stomach. Other triggers include junk food, stress and not chewing food properly. The right diet, lifestyle changes, home remedies and natural supplements can help most patients with acid reflux reverse the condition.
